languages.text: Связь с кораблем Лорд-капитана на орбите потеряна. Единственный путь с планеты лежит через звездную гавань, где можно найти исправные шаттлы.
Contact with the Lord Captain's voidship has been lost. The only way off the planet lies through the starport, which still has intact shuttles.
languages.original_text: Связь с кораблем Лорд-капитана на орбите потеряна. Единственный путь с планеты лежит через звездную гавань, где можно найти исправные шаттлы.

traits.locale_text: Contact with the Lord Captain's voidship has been lost. The only way out from the planet lies through the starport, which still has intact shuttles.
Contact with the Lord Captain's voidship has been lost. The only way off the planet lies through the starport, which still has intact shuttles.
Contact with the Lord Captain's voidship has been lost. The only way off the planet lies through the starport, which still has intact shuttles.

languages.text: Der Kontakt zum Raumschiff des Lord Captain ist abgebrochen. Der einzige Weg, den Planeten zu verlassen, führt über den Raumhafen, wo noch intakte Shuttles liegen.
languages.original_text: Contact with the Lord Captain's voidship has been lost. The only way off the planet lies through the starport, which still has intact shuttles.

traits.locale_text: Der Kontakt zum Raumschiff des Lord Captain ist abgebrochen. Der einzige Weg, den Planeten zu verlassen, führt über den Raumhafen, wo noch intakte Shuttles liegen.

languages.text: Le vaisseau spatial {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ne répond plus. Le seul moyen de quitter la planète est d'atteindre l'astroport, où se trouvent encore des navettes intactes.
languages.original_text: Contact with the Lord Captain's voidship has been lost. The only way off the planet lies through the starport, which still has intact shuttles.

traits.locale_text: Le vaisseau spatial {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ne répond plus. Le seul moyen de quitter la planète est d'atteindre l'astroport, où se trouvent encore des navettes intactes.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンのヴォイドシップとの連絡が途絶えた。この惑星から脱出する唯一の手段は、まだ無傷のシャトルが残っているスターポートにあるはずだ。
languages.original_text: Contact with the Lord Captain's voidship has been lost. The only way off the planet lies through the starport, which still has intact shuttles.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンのヴォイドシップとの連絡が途絶えた。この惑星から脱出する唯一の手段は、まだ無傷のシャトルが残っているスターポートにあるはずだ。

languages.text: Se ha perdido el contacto con la nave del vacío de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. La única salida del planeta es por el puerto estelar, que aún contiene lanzaderas intactas.
languages.original_text: Contact with the Lord Captain's voidship has been lost. The only way off the planet lies through the starport, which still has intact shuttles.

traits.locale_text: Se ha perdido el contacto con la nave del vacío de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. La única salida del planeta es por el puerto estelar, que aún contiene lanzaderas intactas.

languages.text: 领主舰长与虚空舰失去了联系。如今，离开这颗行星的唯一途径就是星港，那里还有完好无损的穿梭机。
languages.original_text: Contact with the Lord Captain's voidship has been lost. The only way off the planet lies through the starport, which still has intact shuttles.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长与虚空舰失去了联系。如今，离开这颗行星的唯一途径就是星港，那里还有完好无损的穿梭机。

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın uçsuz gemisiyle irtibatı kesildi. Gezegenden ayrılmanın tek yolu, hâlâ sağlam durumda mekikleri bulunan yıldız limanından geçiyor.
languages.original_text: Contact with the Lord Captain's voidship has been lost. The only way off the planet lies through the starport, which still has intact shuttles.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan'ın uçsuz gemisiyle irtibatı kesildi. Gezegenden ayrılmanın tek yolu, hâlâ sağlam durumda mekikleri bulunan yıldız limanından geçiyor.
